entries.title: Make some nice outdoor spaces in this digital toy about gardening
entries.description: Garden Galaxy is a creative sandbox for the landscape architect in all of us.

entries.title: Climb some psychic crystals and get dreamcrungled in the latest Caves of Qud release
entries.description: Oh, and nice UI updates alongside a boatload of new sound.

entries.title: Zotac GeForce RTX 4080 AMP Extreme Airo
PSA: One of our favorite games of 2021 is free to keep on the Epic Games Store today
entries.description: Sable is a chill hang, a good time, and a wonderful sci-fi experience.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 547 answer and hint for Sunday, December 18
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #547 puzzle.

entries.title: Darktide made us hungry for sick Warhammer 40K art, so here's 40 wallpapers for your desktop or phone
entries.description: Darktide has us wanting to pay homage to the Golden Throne.

entries.title: HTC is making a new VR headset to compete with the Quest 2
entries.description: It won't "compromise on privacy" to keep the price down, according to HTC.

entries.title: Warcraft 3 Re-Reforged mod follows through on Blizzard promises
entries.description: You can play the prologue campaign and the full human campaign now.

entries.title: 40 years after being canceled, the D&D cartoon will return as a comic
entries.description: Guess they didn't get eaten by a dragon after all.
